function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"GPS traces wrong location due to satellite signal blockage by concrete structures.","Impact":"Misguided navigation, leading to inconvenience or delays.","Mitigation":"Improving GPS technology to account for signal blockage, using alternative navigation methods in congested areas.","Technologies":"Signal amplification, improved GPS algorithms, integration with alternative navigation systems.","People":"Individuals who rely on GPS for navigation in built-up areas.","Owner":"GPS technology developers, urban planners, infrastructure designers."},{"Description":"GPS errors due to storms, radio interference, and hardware or software faults.","Impact":"Inaccurate location tracking, leading to navigation errors and miscommunications.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust GPS signal processing, enhancing hardware resilience, and updating software with accurate mapping data.","Technologies":"Signal filtering for interference, weather-resistant hardware, software updates for accurate map data.","People":"Anyone relying on GPS for accurate location services.","Owner":"GPS technology developers, mobile app developers, software engineers."},{"Description":"Use of mobile technology for COVID-19 contact tracing and monitoring.","Impact":"Effective containment of the virus, rapid tracing of infected persons, and data-driven public health measures.","Mitigation":"Ensuring user privacy, accurate data bridging between healthcare staff and individuals, and rapid identification of high-risk locations.","Technologies":"Secure mobile apps, data encryption, GPS tracking, and data analytics.","People":"Government health agencies, mobile app users, healthcare staff, and individuals in the community.","Owner":"Government health agencies, mobile app developers, data analysts, and healthcare professionals."}]}
